entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 12:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

Temperature: 1.9°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 50 %

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm near Fernie. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High plus 4.
